app_detail:
â˜… When travel or lost your way then check your direction by led compass with Google map. Smart compass is an application for professionals as well as amateurs! Digital compass for Android features everything you could ever need to get by in the great outdoors

â˜… Smart compass free is a navigational instrument which shows four cardinal directions. GPS compass app finds your actual position (using GPS) and determines all geographical directions. Digital compass application with smart compass for android+ GPS navigation + Map is the most accurate and useful app for navigation and orientation purpose that shows directions based on built-in magnetic sensor.

â˜… Smart compass for Android that shows direction relative to the geographic cardinal directions, with true and magnetic North, south, east, and west coordinates, gps and map that makes navigating your world faster and easier.

â˜… Digital smart compass shows all essential modes required for day-to-day compass activities. This digital compass free supports magnetic north and true north calculated using network or GPS location coordinates, which can be copied, shared and viewed in a map.

ğŸ€ Digital Smart Compass Features :
ğŸ”° Completely new design for Android
- Shows device real-time orientation to magnetic fields.
- Tracks multiple targets simultaneously.
- Integrating compass, map, GPS and weather into 1 application
ğŸ”° Digital smart compass app
- Shows device real-time orientation to magnetic fields.
- Imperial and Metric unit settings.
- Location coordinates (longitude, latitude)
- Its compass free
ğŸ”° GPS Map integration
- Standard maps mode.
- Tracking location changes trajectory.
- GPS map

ğŸ€ Important:
To use digital smart compass for Android, hold your Android device flat, use just like a real compass. Your device must have magnetic sensor inside to read earth magnetic field. If your device does not have magnetic sensor compass app will not work. Please don't write bad comments, it's not our fault!
